channel.title: L0l Gotta see this, funny shit. [TRUE STORY BRO]
channel.description:
Ok so I'm helping my irl friend make a webclient for $5 (so i can get a vps). I'm talking to his partner about him switching to a dif client because his cache downloader was fucked, and he starts getting all mad and saying (I'm Bradley, my friend's Aaron, and the nerd is J For Jawsh :P):
[code][4:25:24 PM] Bradley Carels: u havent done anything to client right? [4:25:29 PM] Aaron watkins: weve done like 3 weeks of work [4:25:31 PM] Bradley Carels: what have u done [4:25:35 PM] Bradley Carels: to CLIENT [4:25:38 PM] Bradley Carels: not server [4:25:53 PM] J For Jawsh :): Uhm Changed the link for the websites. [4:26:01 PM] Aaron watkins: Cant we add a different cache dler? [4:26:01 PM] J For Jawsh :): And changed the client name. [4:26:04 PM] J For Jawsh :): With other shit. [4:26:10 PM] J For Jawsh :): Yes. [4:26:12 PM] J For Jawsh :): You can. [4:26:16 PM] Bradley Carels: that takes 2 seconds [4:26:31 PM] Bradley Carels: ill switch it over for u? [4:26:42 PM] Aaron watkins: but if we change clients wont we lose like korasi spec and the working weapon emotes and shit? [4:26:42 PM] Bradley Carels: im not trying to bag on u im jus saying its easy to switch [4:26:49 PM] J For Jawsh :): Nah. [4:26:53 PM] J For Jawsh :): I'm not switching clients. [4:26:58 PM] Bradley Carels: LOL ok then [4:27:08 PM] J For Jawsh :): I'll just get someone that can actually make it with the client we have.[/code]
So after that I'm like:
[code][4:30:29 PM] Bradley Carels: and + to josh, u said u would find som1 else? [4:30:35 PM] Bradley Carels: no1 will do shit without pay [4:30:42 PM] Bradley Carels: ur lucky im doin it in advance...[/code]
This is how he responded... this is a pic directly from the chat (right before he kicked me out):
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/lololololjosh.jpg[/img]
L0L MUCH?

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The only thing funny about this thread is the stupidity of it all…

Seriously, this isn’t twitter, nobody wants to hear your stupid real life stores of immaturity -__-

Read full topic

Ok so I’m helping my irl friend make a webclient for $5 (so i can get a vps). I’m talking to his partner about him switching to a dif client because his cache downloader was fucked, and he starts getting all mad and saying (I’m Bradley, my friend’s Aaron, and the nerd is J For Jawsh :P):
